snippet.title: RiptideGP®: Renegade Console/PC Gameplay Sky Mines
snippet.description:
Check out the latest Gameplay footage from Riptide GP: Renegade! Environments in Renegade are massive, like this floating mining operation with gigantic machines hovering in the sky -- and conveniently laced with driveable water surfaces!

In Riptide GP: Renegade, armored riders kick out death-defying stunts over massive waterfalls, outrun cops, and boost at breakneck speeds across surging waves. The new game in the popular franchise brings all new tracks, vehicles, and characters, all playable in single player, split screen and online multiplayer races.

Riptide GP: Renegade is coming soon to PlayStation4, Xbox One, Windows 10, and Steam, as well as iOS, Apple TV, Android, Android TV, Kindle, and FireTV.  http://onelink.to/rgpr-vu
